name: Lovell's Day Out
description:
A demo visual novel I made of me and my bestie's characters. This is a personal project!

Don't care and wanna try it? It's about a young man in a poly relationship who goes out on an errand, only to get distracted. 

Two "bad" endings(more silly) and one good ending. A very, verrry short game.

Some cursing and dirty thoughts involved.
